headline: A look at J.B. Hunt (JBHT) valuation as investors eye Q4 after a strong Q3 earnings surprise
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services (JBHT) is back in focus as investors look ahead to its upcoming fourth quarter earnings, after the stock jumped about 22% on stronger than expected third quarter revenue and earnings. See our latest analysis for J.B. Hunt Transport Services. That strong third quarter surprise has turbocharged sentiment, with a roughly 23.6% 1 month share price return and about 49.2% over 3 months, while the 1 year total shareholder return of approximately 17.5% points to momentum...
